backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining user data structures, registration logic, access control, and storage mixins for appointments, patients, and leads.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and functionality of key frontend components, pages, and hooks.
frontend/GO_LIVE.md: Guide outlining prerequisites, checks, and steps for deploying the application to Internet Computer mainnet.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining light/dark theme variables and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up metadata, PWA support, icons, and service worker registration.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest configuring app metadata, icons, theme colors, and display behavior.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing asset caching, cache cleanup, and fetch handling for offline support.
frontend/QA_APPOINTMENTS_ID_REGRESSION_T: QA test plan verifying correct appointment edit/delete behavior using stable IDs across various scenarios.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, routing, tab navigation, background sync, notifications, and overall layout.
Displays an appointment card with time, patient info, and actions like call, WhatsApp, add patient, edit, delete, and follow‑up.
frontend/src/components/AppointmentDialo: Dialog for creating or editing appointments with form fields, contact picker integration, and submission handlers.
frontend/src/components/AppointmentFeedb: Renders buttons to send WhatsApp feedback requests, validating numbers and showing a preview dialog.
frontend/src/components/AppointmentRemin: Full‑screen overlay showing an upcoming appointment reminder with details and a dismiss button.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Bottom navigation bar allowing switching between app tabs with icons and labels.
frontend/src/components/ContactImportRev: Dialog to review and edit imported contact details before confirming use in a form.
frontend/src/components/FollowUpDateTime: A dialog for selecting a date and 12-hour time, converting it to a bigint timestamp, and submitting it via onConfirm.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header bar showing clinic info, sync status, user menu, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/LeadCard.tsx: Displays lead details with actions for calling, WhatsApp, editing, deleting, and updating lead status.
frontend/src/components/LeadDialog.tsx: Form dialog for creating or editing a lead, including contact import, date fields, rating, and conditional appointment creation.
frontend/src/components/NextAppointmentW: Shows the next upcoming appointment or a fallback message when none exist.
frontend/src/components/PatientCard.tsx: Card displaying patient info with call/WhatsApp actions, delete confirmation, and appointment creation dialog.
frontend/src/components/PatientDialog.ts: Dialog for creating or editing a patient with form fields, optional contact import, and camera or file-based image capture.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Modal form for saving the user's name and clinic name using a profile mutation.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppFeedback: Dialog showing a WhatsApp feedback message preview and confirming send action to a patient.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, recreating and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendAwareSync.t: Polls backend modification timestamps and invalidates queries when newer data is detected, with focus- and mutation-based syncing.
frontend/src/hooks/useContactPicker.ts: Wrapper around the Contact Picker API to select a contact's name and phone with structured error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and exposing login and logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useLastSync.ts: Tracks last successful React Query sync time and formats it into human‑readable text.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Manages appointment reminders by scheduling in-app or browser notifications 15 minutes before events and tracking fired reminders.
frontend/src/hooks/useNow.ts: Provides a Date value that updates on a fixed interval, defaulting to once per minute.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating appointments, leads, patients, sync metadata, and user profiles via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSyncOnFocus.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useSyncStatus.ts: Tracks whether any key data queries are currently fetching and returns a global syncing flag.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base/style configuration with custom theme variables, dark mode values, scrollbars, and global transitions.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility helpers for class merging and date/time formatting from bigint timestamps and Date objects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the main application.
frontend/src/pages/LeadsTab.tsx: Displays, sorts, and manages creation/editing of leads with a floating add button and dialog.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen for Internet Identity authentication with UI feedback and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/PatientsTab.tsx: Displays patient list with search, loading states, and edit/add dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/ScheduleTab.tsx: Shows today’s, tomorrow’s, and upcoming appointments with edit and follow‑up scheduling.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsTab.tsx: Provides clinic profile editing, data sync, exports, and PWA install handling.
frontend/src/pages/WidgetView.tsx: Renders a compact widget showing the next upcoming appointment and treatment details.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for Appointment, Patient, and Lead entities.
frontend/src/utils/leadAnalysis.ts: Analyzes leads by categorizing them and determining conversions based on appointments.
frontend/src/utils/notificationSound.ts: Generates a short notification tone using the Web Audio API.
frontend/src/utils/phone.ts: Normalizes phone numbers by removing spaces and common separators.
frontend/src/utils/treatment.ts: Extracts and normalizes treatment text from notes and compares treatment strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based parameters.
frontend/src/utils/whatsappFeedback.ts: Generates WhatsApp feedback messages and URLs, and validates mobile numbers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, issues, and feature requests regarding widget removal and date format changes.
